typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as short,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
CasesAndDeathsSource filter(continent == "Europe" && not(isNull(country_code)) ) ~> OnlyEurope
OnlyEurope select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		date,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectField
SelectField pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		population,
		date,
		source),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['confirmed', 'death']),
	cases = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$V $N',
	lateral: true) ~> IndicatorProcess
